Class LcarsApp

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
LcarsApp
public class LcarsApp extends javafx.application.Application
LCARS-inspired file console built with JavaFX.

Features:

  • Explorer UI with navigation, quick folders, and right-side properties.
  • Copy / Cut / Paste with true move semantics (fallback to copy+delete).
  • Desktop tile canvas that mirrors files on the real Desktop folder.
  • Persistent tile positions saved to ~/.lcars_desktop.txt.
  • Holographic drive widget and connectivity monitor overlay.
This class is the JavaFX application entry point and assembles the primary scene graph.

  • Method Details

    • lcarsFontOrDefault

      private static javafx.scene.text.Font lcarsFontOrDefault(double size, boolean bold)
      Attempts to load a custom LCARS TTF from the working directory and returns it at the given size. Falls back to the system font if unavailable. Optionally returns a bold variant.
      Parameters:
      size - point size to use
      bold - true for bold weight
      Returns:
      a Font instance (custom LCARS if found, otherwise system font)

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primary)
      JavaFX app entrypoint. Builds the main UI, sets full-screen scene, restores desktop state, and plays the intro overlay.
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application

      total - total bytes capacity

    • getSystemDriveRoot

      private File getSystemDriveRoot()
      Heuristic to find a usable system drive root. Prefers the user's home root, then falls back to first file root.

      private void playIntroOverlay(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane host)
      Plays a quick LCARS intro animation overlay (sliding color bars and title) then fades it out.

    • attachConnectivityMonitor

      private void attachConnectivityMonitor(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane host)
      Adds a network connectivity monitor overlay that blinks and beeps when offline. Polls on a timeline and updates visibility/reactivity on the FX thread.

    • checkAndSet

      private void checkAndSet(javafx.scene.layout.StackPane overlay, javafx.animation.Timeline blink, boolean[] wasOnline, Runnable playBeep)
      Worker for the connectivity monitor. Spawns a short background check and updates the overlay.

    • isInternetAvailable

      private boolean isInternetAvailable()
      Simple online check using a TCP connect to 8.8.8.8:53 with a short timeout.
      Returns:
      true if a socket connection succeeds quickly; false otherwise

    • playAlarmTone

      private void playAlarmTone(int hz, int millis)
      Generates a short sine-wave tone (mono, 44.1kHz, 16-bit) and plays it synchronously. Used by the offline alert.

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(String title, String message)
      Shows a simple utility information dialog with the given title and message.
      Parameters:
      title - window title for the alert
      message - body text to display

    • openWithDesktop

      private static void openWithDesktop(File f)
      Attempts to open the given file using the OS desktop handler (e.g., default app). No-op if Desktop integration isn't supported.
      Parameters:
      f - file to open

    • knownFolder

      private static File knownFolder(String kind)
      Returns a “known” user folder (Desktop, Documents, etc.), checking common OneDrive locations on Windows. Returns null if none exist.
      Parameters:
      kind - one of: "Desktop", "Documents", "Downloads", "Pictures", "Music", "Videos"
      Returns:
      existing folder File or null

    • isInDesktop

      private static boolean isInDesktop(File f)
      Returns:
      true if the file's parent directory is the user's Desktop (case-insensitive).

    • deleteRecursive

      private static void deleteRecursive(Path p) throws IOException
      Recursively deletes a file/directory tree. Best-effort: per-file IOExceptions are swallowed.
      Parameters:
      p - path to delete
      Throws:
      IOException - if walking the tree fails

    • copyRecursive

      private static void copyRecursive(Path src, Path dst) throws IOException
      Recursively copies a directory tree (or single file) into dst, replacing existing files.
      Parameters:
      src - source path (dir or file)
      dst - destination path
      Throws:
      IOException - if walking the tree fails

    • isImageFile

      private static boolean isImageFile(File f)
      Returns:
      true for common raster image file extensions.

    • probeTypeSafe

      private static String probeTypeSafe(Path p)
      Attempts to probe content-type; falls back to "EXT file" by extension, else "Unknown".
      Parameters:
      p - path to test
      Returns:
      human-readable type

    • uniqueName

      private static File uniqueName(File desired)
      Generates a non-colliding name by appending " - Copy", " - Copy (n)" before the extension.
      Parameters:
      desired - initial file path
      Returns:
      unique path in the same directory

    • main

      Standard Java launcher for environments that don’t support direct JavaFX launch.
      Parameters:
      args - CLI arguments (unused)
